item.title: Google CTF 2020 teleport: Chromium sandbox escape
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: Teleport Please write a full-chain exploit for Chrome. The flag is at /home/user/flag. Maybe there’s some way to tele<port> it out of there? 1. Story Hi, last week I participated in Google CTF 2020 with my team pwnPHOfun
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: kpets FacebookCTF 2019 QR
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: kpets welcome to Kernel Pets Simulator! We wrote a pet store application that was too slow, so we made a kernel module for it instead. Author: pippinthedog Hi everyone, this is the writeup for the Facebook CTF 2019 Qualification Round kpets challenge
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: IPwnKit DEFCON CTF 26 QR
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: IPwnKit Come and take a bite of the Apple! We have reserved you a very special place at the WWPC (World Wide Pwning Conference). Email ipwnkit@gmail.com to RSVP and we will reply with your invite.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: AceBear Security Contest House-of-loop
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: House-of-loop Hi everyone, this is the writeup for the challenge House-of-loop in the AceBear Security Contest 2019 You may want to checkout the exploit code Description We are given a stripped ELF x64 binary which can be interacted with, our task is to get remote code execution(RCE).
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: TetCTF babySandbox
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: Baby Sandbox This is a challenge of TetCTF, which is hosted from Jan 1st to Jan 7th by MeePwn Team of Vietnam You may want to checkout the exploit code Challenge description We are given 2 binary, one is sandbox and the other one is program.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: 35C3 CTF Pillow
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: Pillow Background This is the writeup for the challenge Pillow, created by Samuel Groß(@saelo) of Project Zero, of 35C3 CTF annually organized by @EatSleepPwnRpt happening at the end of year 2018. I didn’t solve this challenge during the CTF, when revisiting this challenge after checkout @LinusHenze repo, I have a big learning oppuntunity to checkout XNU exploitation, which was completely new to me.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 Bucket-o-cash
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: By cating and grepping the file, we know that there was a file named /home/memes/flag.c It’s probably a program, so I searched for ./flag Just printing the line doesn’t seem to work so I tried cat memorydump | grep -A 10 -B 10 .
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 Freeze
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: It’s clearly a python compiled program since there is a libpython and also, when using decompiler, there was a function name PyDontWriteByteCode using ‘pyi-archive-viewer’ we can extract the main function. Append headers to the file "\x03\xf3\x0d\x0a\xf1\x32\x75\x5a" using uncompyle, we can get the main function.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 Gimme sum fud
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: The binary loads the flag.txt to the memory and asks us to provide input. Interesting things is that it loads to the same memory segment with the input. Debugging locally, I found it at the offset 752 from the first input bytes.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 The tangled web
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: wget -r fun.ritsec.club:8007 You may find the file Fl4gggg1337.html is referenced or has already been download. The flag wasn’t there, but it has link to Stars.html. Fetch that file, the base64 encoded string is the flag for this challenge.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 Yet another HR Management Framework
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: By judging the program’s interface, we know that it was a heap challenge. Spent quite a lot of time reversing it, I figured it out that it malloc a few bytes for the person struct on the heap, then the name will be malloc with the size entered and that address will be put in the person struct.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: matesCTF babyOVERFLOW
item.author: ntrung03@gmail.com (Nguyen Hoang Trung)
item.description: babyOVERFLOW Exploit Tên file bài này gợi ý rất nhiều. “baby” thường được dùng trong CTF chỉ những bài đơn giản dành cho người mới “OVERFLOW” ở đây thì chỉ đến stack buffer overflow. Chạy nó, nhập vào thì nó in ra lại đúng như thế.
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Hoang Trung
